column2: Drop the books, grab some fries, studying is for the wise guys.
Ditch the notes, take a stroll, learning's for those with a serious goal.
Hide the homework, watch a show, knowledge is for those who know.
Lock the textbooks, find some joy, studying's just a decoy.
Toss the papers, let’s have fun, hitting the books is for everyone else under the sun.
Close the laptop, grab a snack, education's always got your back.
Skip the lecture, ride a bike, schoolwork's not our type.
Turn off Zoom, take a nap, academia's for those who like the trap.
Stash the assignments, play a game, serious students put us all to shame.
Ignore the syllabus, sing a song, academia all day long!
Forget the class, let's build a fort, learning's for the serious sort.
Dismiss the lesson, take a dive, schoolwork is for the hive.
Postpone the study, have a blast, academic worries are so vast.
Delay the project, take a nap, education’s got a boring map.
Skip the research, chase a cloud, academia's for the overly proud.
Abandon the task, hit the town, studies are a serious clown.
Ignore the quiz, catch a flick, school’s a serious stick.
Close the chapters, enjoy the sun, learning's for those who call it fun.
Forget the terms, let's dance, academics are for those who take a stance.
Cancel the homework, hit the beat, education’s for those who never skip a beat.
